constructor-arg.value: SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.name_original, t1.release_year, t1.description, t1.rating, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t3.name ORDER BY t3.id DESC SEPARATOR ',') genres, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t5.name ORDER BY t5.name DESC SEPARATOR ', ') countries FROM movie t1 LEFT JOIN movie_genre t2 ON t1.id = t2.movie_id LEFT JOIN genre t3 ON t2.genre_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN movie_country t4 on t1.id = t4.movie_id LEFT JOIN country t5 on t4.country_id = t5.id GROUP BY t1.id, t1.name, t1.name_original, t1.release_year, t1.description, t1.rating;

SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.name_original, t1.release_year, t1.description, t1.rating, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t3.name ORDER BY t3.id DESC SEPARATOR ',') genres, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t5.name ORDER BY t5.name DESC SEPARATOR ', ') countries FROM movie t1 LEFT JOIN movie_genre t2 ON t1.id = t2.movie_id LEFT JOIN genre t3 ON t2.genre_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN movie_country t4 on t1.id = t4.movie_id LEFT JOIN country t5 on t4.country_id = t5.id WHERE t1.id = ? GROUP BY t1.id, t1.name, t1.name_original, t1.release_year, t1.description, t1.rating;
SELECT t1.id, t1.movie_id, t1.user_id, t1.text, t2.first_name, t2.last_name FROM review t1 join user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.id WHERE t1.movie_id = ?;
